description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTPolioSequentialIPVbOPV for IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.Sequential IPV–bOPV. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a poliovirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Sequential "Bivalent oral polio vaccine (bOPV)–inactivated polio vaccine (IPV)" schedule (in countries with high vaccination coverage [e.g. 90–95%] and low importation risk [where neighbouring countries and/or countries that share substantial population movement have a similarly high coverage])
